title: No Video, But Sales Role Play that Works
text: This is amazing - really nice for walking through practice sales calls. This actually feels close to what some hyped paid products do, especially on the phone with voice input - which only takes a second and feels natural. It’s not as realistic as a Zoom call - no video - but excellent guidance. Whoever built it clearly has a background in sales effectiveness.

title: ASTONISHING
text: This app is absolutely intelligent and effective (speaking of the premium version). I have only had it for one day, and so far with what I have discovered, I asked it to design the cover of my book based on the information I gave it, and EVEN had it check my grammar in Arabic. It also has features where you can insert a photo and ask it to animate it or make an adjustment. It even provides you with the feature of having a conversation as you don’t have to repeat your request when you’re adding onto it. So you can basically ask it to make an adjustment with the image it generated without having to retype your entire description. I only wish if it were quite more affordable as it only offers a monthly payment of $20.

title: A Mixed Experience with ChatGPT
text:
I've been using ChatGPT for a while now, and overall, it's been a pretty good experience. The language model is quite proficient at generating responses and engaging in conversation. However, there are a couple of drawbacks worth mentioning.

Firstly, the information provided is not always up to date and accurate. It's crucial to double-check facts from more reliable sources when needed.

Secondly, when instructing ChatGPT to write messages to others, there is a tendency for recipients to perceive it as not genuinely coming from me. Whether it's the tone or style, it sometimes raises suspicions that I might be using a robot or an automated service.

Despite these limitations, I appreciate the convenience and versatility that ChatGPT offers. It's a handy tool for generating ideas and creative content.

Overall, a valuable resource, but proceed with caution in situations where accuracy and personal touch are crucial

title: Data Control bug
text: The Data Control tab is supposed to allow you to opt out of keeping chat history and improving the model. I selected opt out and it would be fine, but a few days later it begins saving my chat history again. Then the Data Control tab reverted to having only the option to opt out from improving the model. This has happened before and eventually the disable history function will re-appear. I just don’t know how to make it re-appear. As it stands, not sure I can trust it to not keep my chat history on their servers or use it to improve their model even if the full Data Control functionality appears to work again.

title: Great Potential, but not quite there yet
text: Bullet points text doesn't wrap to fit in the visible screen area because the text doesn't scale correctly when you use a larger text size in iOS settings (Settings > Display & Brightness> Text Size). That bug impedes users who wear glasses or have vision problems. ChatGPT for iOS doesn't have the capability to read documents. I wish ChatGPT allowed overall custom instructions that applied to all future chats as well as custom instructions that could be soloed to specific chats. I don't want ChatGPT following draft writing instructions if I'm working on programming or researching. In order to prevent ChatGPT from following unrelated instructions, I have to change the main Custom Instructions when I create a new chat for a project unrelated to the current custom instructions. Overall ChatGPT, is a very useful and powerful tool that I would like to see it's continued improval.

title: Life
text: this app is astonishing because of how incredible the A.I. is. Your breath will be taken away. However, I think this app is incredibly dangerous. I am not one of those people who makes weird conspiracies and I’m not really a political person at all. I just think this app could lead to dangerous consequences. Maybe it’s because I recently watched Steven Spielberg’s A.I.: Artificial Intelligence but I think we often forget about the unreplacable power of human hands. Robots will never be able to craft beauty like humans do, regardless of how advanced it is. Nothing A.I. creates will be able to inspire or wow anyone, which is the sole reason we read a book or watch a movie. Life is more than how advanced an app can be. Life is poetry. Every single person on this earth - YOU INCLUDED - has the potential to become anything, and it is a true testament of power if you can achieve greatness. I’m afraid A.I. could take this away. Have a great day and go fulfill your dreams.

title: Title: ChatGPT: Enhancing Communication and Efficiency with AI
text:
In the digital era, ChatGPT has emerged as a pivotal tool, offering a wide array of benefits such as providing factual information and completing tasks efficiently. With access to vast data repositories, ChatGPT swiftly delivers accurate facts on diverse topics, aiding learning and decision-making. Its versatility extends to task completion, from setting reminders to composing emails, streamlining daily activities. Additionally, ChatGPT's adaptability tailors interactions to individual preferences, fostering personalized experiences. While it may have occasional limitations, ChatGPT's transformative impact on communication and efficiency is undeniable, showcasing the potential of AI in enriching human capabilities and interactions.
